abstract: Over the past year, JPMorgan Chase‘s James Dimon has garnered wide acclaim as a modern-day J. P. Morgan of sorts, swooping in to rescue ailing banks at the government’s behest.
lead_paragraph: Over the past year, JPMorgan Chase‘s James Dimon has garnered wide acclaim as a modern-day J. P. Morgan of sorts, swooping in to rescue ailing banks at the government’s behest.

headline.main: And the Banker of the Year Award Goes to …
